txt.en: Miner
'This is boring.'
Hobbit Lass
'He'll just want to race along the stone walls again. That's dull.'
'Stories! Is that how we're supposed to spend our tweens?'
'Have you ever been to Bree, Bingo?'
'We should go! It'll be an Adventure!'
'I shan't talk to you anymore if we don't go on an Adventure.'
'There you are, Ruby! I thought you were going to miss dinner!'
'We'll find food in the wild! And treasure too, I'd imagine!'
'Bingo is invited as well, of course.'
'We could go see Belgo in Brockenborings.'
'Let's go, Bingo! Let's start our Adventure!'
'Maybe our Adventure can wait until after dinner.'
'I thought it was pretty fun.'
'We could see if Reginard is in town. His stories are always good.'
'They're good stories, sometimes.'
Hobbit Lad
'No.'
'Are you sure you wouldn't rather go see Belgo?'
'Er...okay...yes! We'll go to Bree!'
'Do we need any supplies?'
'I hope there's good food in Bree.'
'Or tomorrow, even!'
